All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BaseRequestValidator<T extends Annotation,V>
Abstract base class for custom validation logic applied to RequestDto fields.
BestCombinationController
Controller class for handling API requests related to calculating the best combination of items.
BestCombinationFinder
Service to determine the optimal combination of items from a given combination matrix.
BestCombinationService
Provides services to find the best combination of items from a given request.
BoxWeightValidator
Validator for checking the maximum weight of a box against specific constraints.
CombinationMatrix
Represents a matrix used in dynamic programming to track combinations of items with associated prices and weights.
CombinationMatrixBuilder
Service responsible for constructing a combination matrix for item optimization.
ConstraintsConfiguration
Configures constraints for items and boxes from application properties.
ConstraintsConfiguration.Box
Represents constraints for a box.
ConstraintsConfiguration.Items
Represents constraints specific to items.
DataFormatConfiguration
Binds data format properties from the application configuration.
DataFormatConfigurationMock
 
DoubleArrayUtils
Utility class providing methods for operations on two-dimensional arrays.
ExceptionHandlingControllerAdvice
Global exception handler for the application.
ItemDto
Data Transfer Object representing an item.
ItemPriceValidator
Validator for checking the weight of an item against specific constraints.
ItemWeightValidator
Validator for ensuring the price of an item adheres to specified constraints.
MarcoromanoApplication
 
RequestDto
Data Transfer Object representing a request containing items and maximum weight constraint.
ResponseDto
Represents the response containing the optimal set of item identifiers.
TestDataFactory
 
ValidBoxWeight
Custom validation annotation for ensuring the weight of a box meets specific criteria.
ValidItemPrice
Custom constraint annotation for validating the price of an item.
ValidItemWeight
Custom constraint annotation for validating the weight of an item.
WeightRescaler
Provides functionality to rescale weight values based on a configuration-driven scale factor.
